plot: As Charlie continues to shut out the world around him, his imagination opens up a door to another realm. There he meets the enigmatic Dishers who leads him on a journey of self discovery.
title: The Mind's Wood
plot_es: As Charlie continues to shut out the world around him, his imagination opens up a door to another realm. There he meets the enigmatic Dishers who leads him on a journey of self discovery.
plot_en: As Charlie continues to shut out the world around him, his imagination opens up a door to another realm. There he meets the enigmatic Dishers who leads him on a journey of self discovery.
